answers.text:
We provide an anonymous hotline to our employees (1469 FTE) through a contract with The Network.  Resources to investigate and report are dependent on the complaint submitted.  I generally budget around 300 to 400 hours annually.  
Audrey Evins, CPA
City Auditor
City of Las Cruces
aevins@las-cruces.org

author: Pamela Weir
text:
We are examining the possibility of implementing an Ethics Hotline, and would appreciate any examples of successful programs currently in existence. 
Does your organization use a third-party vendor for anonymous reporting of ethics violations? Which one, what is the cost of using such a tool, and how much internal staff time and/or O&M cost is there in addition to the third-party vendor's services? Finally, what is the size of your organization?
Thank you in advance!
title: Ethics Hotline
